comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Bump husky from 8.0.3 to 9.0.7

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

labels.name: javascript
labels.description: Pull requests that update Javascript code

issue.body:
Bumps [husky](https://github.com/typicode/husky) from 8.0.3 to 9.0.7.
Release notes

Sourced from husky's releases.

v9.0.7

  • fix: typo and source ~/.huskyrc correctly (compatibility with v8)
  • docs: fix example by @typicode in typicode/husky#1363

v9.0.6

  • docs: add favicon by @rakleed in typicode/husky#1354
  • chore: apply editorconfig to code only by @typicode in typicode/husky#1355
  • docs: update install script to mjs and fix CI checks by @starnayuta in typicode/husky#1357
  • Fix unbound variable by @typicode in typicode/husky#1359

v9.0.5

  • docs: update path to startup files by @ManuelRauber in typicode/husky#1350
  • fix: init error by @typicode in typicode/husky#1353

v9.0.4

  • fix: init create dir before by @typicode in typicode/husky#1348
  • refactor: simplify by @typicode in typicode/husky#1349
  • fix: init not working on pnpm #1334 by @rozbo in typicode/husky#1347

v9.0.3

  • docs: fix link by @typicode in typicode/husky#1340
  • chore: fix links in issue template by @julien-f in typicode/husky#1341
  • fix: add scripts field if not present by @chalkygames123 in typicode/husky#1338
  • docs: changelog link by @typicode in typicode/husky#1343
  • fix: insert final newline by @chalkygames123 in typicode/husky#1339
  • fix: fix git hooks path on windows by @rozbo in typicode/husky#1346

v9.0.2

  • fix: exit code by @gergelypap in typicode/husky#1336
  • docs: typo by @chalkygames123 in typicode/husky#1337

v9.0.1

TLDR;

Improved user experience and a (even) smaller package size while packing in more features!

Note: install using husky@latest to get the bug fixes that were released after.

By the Way

I'm available for remote work (Front-end/Back-end mainly JS/TS but open to other stacks Rails, Go, Elixir). You can contact me at my mail: typicode at gmail :slightly_smiling_face:

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 9e08ef0 chrore: bump version
  • 04d7407 fix: typo in sourcing ~/.huskyrc
  • 800fbf1 docs: fix example (#1363)
  • c1bbd9b style: indent
  • 2da78cb 9.0.6
  • 797dfdf Fix: unbound variable (#1359)
  • e7ada20 docs: update install script to mjs and simplify (#1357)
  • 534bfed chore: apply editorconfig to code only (#1355)
  • f446351 docs: add favicon (#1354)

pull_request.title: Bump husky from 8.0.3 to 9.0.7
pull_request.body:
Bumps [husky](https://github.com/typicode/husky) from 8.0.3 to 9.0.7.
Release notes

Sourced from husky's releases.

v9.0.7

  • fix: typo and source ~/.huskyrc correctly (compatibility with v8)
  • docs: fix example by @typicode in typicode/husky#1363

v9.0.6

  • docs: add favicon by @rakleed in typicode/husky#1354
  • chore: apply editorconfig to code only by @typicode in typicode/husky#1355
  • docs: update install script to mjs and fix CI checks by @starnayuta in typicode/husky#1357
  • Fix unbound variable by @typicode in typicode/husky#1359

v9.0.5

  • docs: update path to startup files by @ManuelRauber in typicode/husky#1350
  • fix: init error by @typicode in typicode/husky#1353

v9.0.4

  • fix: init create dir before by @typicode in typicode/husky#1348
  • refactor: simplify by @typicode in typicode/husky#1349
  • fix: init not working on pnpm #1334 by @rozbo in typicode/husky#1347

v9.0.3

  • docs: fix link by @typicode in typicode/husky#1340
  • chore: fix links in issue template by @julien-f in typicode/husky#1341
  • fix: add scripts field if not present by @chalkygames123 in typicode/husky#1338
  • docs: changelog link by @typicode in typicode/husky#1343
  • fix: insert final newline by @chalkygames123 in typicode/husky#1339
  • fix: fix git hooks path on windows by @rozbo in typicode/husky#1346

v9.0.2

  • fix: exit code by @gergelypap in typicode/husky#1336
  • docs: typo by @chalkygames123 in typicode/husky#1337

v9.0.1

TLDR;

Improved user experience and a (even) smaller package size while packing in more features!

Note: install using husky@latest to get the bug fixes that were released after.

By the Way

I'm available for remote work (Front-end/Back-end mainly JS/TS but open to other stacks Rails, Go, Elixir). You can contact me at my mail: typicode at gmail :slightly_smiling_face:

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 9e08ef0 chrore: bump version
  • 04d7407 fix: typo in sourcing ~/.huskyrc
  • 800fbf1 docs: fix example (#1363)
  • c1bbd9b style: indent
  • 2da78cb 9.0.6
  • 797dfdf Fix: unbound variable (#1359)
  • e7ada20 docs: update install script to mjs and simplify (#1357)
  • 534bfed chore: apply editorconfig to code only (#1355)
  • f446351 docs: add favicon (#1354)
  • 8314bef 9.0.5

issue.title: Husky v9
issue.body:
Update Husky to v9.

See migration guide: https://github.com/typicode/husky/releases/tag/v9.0.1

comment.body:
@ameshkov @Alex-302 There is an issue that you should know about. According to [the migration guide](https://github.com/typicode/husky/releases/tag/v9.0.1), Husky 9 no longer requires the presence of the following 2 lines in the hook scripts:

```sh
#!/usr/bin/env sh
  . "$(dirname -- "$0")/_/husky.sh"
```

The problem: if a dependency is updated in the GitHub repo, we have to update it in the local repo as well. This is currently automatic in the filters repo and is done through Husky's `post-merge` hook. So if the user pulls the changes and the `package.json` or `yarn.lock` changed between the old HEAD and the new HEAD, `yarn install --force` is automatically called. This is a convenient behaviour in this repo and helps keep the linter results consistent, no one forgets to update.

However, since Husky 9 no longer requires these 2 lines, and I removed them in this PR, the following will happen, if we merge this PR in its current form:
- the user currently has Husky 8 installed locally
- the user pulls the latest changes from GitHub, so the 2 lines disappear from their local `post-merge`
- the locally installed Husky 8 tries to run the new `post-merge` hook but won't be able to spawn because the shebang is missing

Also, `pre-commit` hook will fail for the same reason.

So there are two options:
1. the user manually calls the `yarn install --force` command in this case (then Husky 9 will be installed locally, the automatic process will work again) - no need to call it again manually after that
2. we keep the lines - in theory, Husky 9 is backwards compatible, although I don't know if it will ever be marked as deprecated, currently `.husky/_/husky.sh` is just an empty file in Husky 9 to avoid errors, we will probably have to make this change at some point anyway

What do you suggest?

comment.body: I don't see a problem with blocking it. I believe the reason paywalls are not blocked is because it would allow users to see content they did not pay for, which could result in legal issues. The thing I reported does not do that; it even has a little x button that lets you close it and keep reading.
